Question
========

The *margin of error* of a *confidence interval* for the population mean becomes smaller as

Answerlist
----------

* The confidence level increases
* The sample size decreases
* The standard deviation in the data decreases

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The confidence level gets higher: Incorrect
* The sample size decreases: Incorrect
* The standard deviation in the data decreases: Correct
